thread.title: ANAMARIA

author: ANAMARIA
title: ANAMARIA
text:
I called ASAP to ask about a fly to Europe that I saw on line, and I ended buying the trip, but not the one I was asking questions about, It was a better trip. Toby was very nice, knowledge, and he finish the job that he started. Toby told me that he will call me in 30 minutes and he did. He help me through the on line purchase.
I get nerves buying a trip on line or on the phone and Toby make me feel comfortable.
Thank you
Ana Maria
